message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product at a competitive price of $14,000. I believe this product will be very valuable for you.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to share the product. I am looking for a product within my budget, and I would like to propose a price of $12,000 for it.
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your position, but $12,000 is below its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $12,500.
